title: 95/119/EC: Commission Decision of 7 April 1995 concerning certain protective measures with regard to fishery products originating in Japan
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 7 April 1995 concerning certain protective measures with regard to fishery  products originating in Japan (Text with EEA relevance) (95/119/EC)
THE COMMISSION  OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Member States shall prohibit the import of consignments of fishery  products in whatever form originating in Japan.
Member States shall amend the measures that they apply to imports to comply with this  Decision. They shall inform the Commission thereof.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 April 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
